main event: A bright orange light was reported in the sky but disappeared while a glow remained.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 0130 on October 5, 1957., The observation was documented as being from a civilian source., The light was categorized as possibly being a balloon or aircraft., The report was an extract from SDO Capt Douglas J Davis' report dated June 19, 1957., Civil Defense received the call reporting the UFO sighting.
witness description: Civilian report, no confirmed witnesses mentioned.
